ValidationRule.description: You cannot enter a value in Distribution Submitted to CAM until these fields are completed: Employer Authorization to Distribute, Death Certificate , Distribution Paperwork
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
RecordType.Name = 'Death Distribution' && NOT ISBLANK( Distribution_Submitted_to_CAM__c) && (
ISBLANK(Employer_Authorization_to_Distribute__c) || ISBLANK(Death_Certificate__c)|| ISBLANK(Distribution_Paperwork__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot enter a value in Distribution Submitted to CAM until these fields are completed: Employer Authorization to Distribute, Death Certificate , Distribution Paperwork
